dev_equivalent.explanation: A mid-level developer writes ~150 lines of production code per day at ~$500/day (fully loaded). Today's 14,272 net lines represent approximately 95 developer-days of output — what a small team would produce in 4+ months.

assumptions.basis: Industry average for meaningful, reviewed, production-quality code
